info.name: dark tweetdeck
info.description: A heavily edited version of TweetDeck Dark/Orange. I claim no ownership over the original coding, I merely used it as a base and will keep it updated. Utilizing it with BetterTweetdeck is heavily recommended.
info.additionalInfo: Update 2/20: Centered each column (recommended column number: 4), changed additional animations to suit monochromatic theme, made additional minor tweaks.
